heading: HB07958
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE PHILIPPINE PARTICIPATION IN THE INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION OF THE VENICE BIENNALE IN VENICE, ITALY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2018-08-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07958
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE PHILIPPINE PARTICIPATION IN THE INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION OF THE VENICE BIENNALE IN VENICE, ITALY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Creates the Philippine Arts in Venice Biennale Coordinating Committee (PAVB-CC) to manage the country’s participation in arts exhibits in Venice, Italy to help develop arts and culture.
ALIAS NAME : "Philippine Arts in Venice Biennale Act."
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DURANO, RAMON "RED" VI H.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-08-16)2. Alonte (000 2018-11-26)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2018-08-01
